participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.
I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
My new job in the medical field is much more fulfilling than my old job as a tour guide.
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.

participant_2.background:
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.
i do not drink alcohol.
I want to make sure all my files are properly named and organized so I can find them easily when I need them.
i like eating pretzels.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.

content.text: Pretty good! How are you doing?
I'm doing alright. I just got back from the dog park.
Oh nice! Do you have any pets?
Yeah, I have a dog named Bailey. She's a golden retriever.
Oh wow! I love golden retrievers. I used to have one named Buddy.
Oh really? What was he like?
He was the best dog ever. He was so friendly and loving.
I'm sorry to hear that he passed away.
Thanks. It was hard at first, but I know he's in a better place.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, listen to music, and watch movies.
Oh nice! I love going to concerts too. I just saw my favorite band last week.
It was The Killers. They were amazing!
Oh nice! I've never seen them live.
You should! They put on a great show.
I'll have to check them out.
